mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( Product_name, Product_price, Product_count,Product_option) VALUES (#{Product_name}, #{Product_price}, #{Product_count},#{Product_option})
INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_COUNT,PRODUCT_OPTION) VALUES (#{PRODUCT_NAME}, #{PRODUCT_PRICE}, #{PRODUCT_COUNT},#{PRODUCT_OPTION})
